note: I was once an air circus performer but that was after I fought a war in the jungle and before I met Elvis. I've been married for 50+ years. I have crossed the Pacific 12 times, the Atlantic 28 times, the Sahara twice, the Amazon six times and the equator 10 times. I've got three hole-in-one's, and I’ve driven a golf ball from the northern hemisphere into the southern hemisphere more than once. I’ve been shot at and missed and once skied down an airport runway under an airplane in flight.
